inn1.comm: starts with a short ball angling in towards Rahane, he stays back and gets a glove while trying to fend it on the leg side
beaten! Superb swing from the short of length delivery from outside leg, Dhawan opened the face of the bat and was squared up completely
down the leg side this time without any swing, off the pad down to fine leg
swinging way from length well outside off, Rahane lets it go
swings it away from outside off again, wide this time
angled in towards Rahane now, touch shorter and he defends in on off
straight delivery well outside off, left alone easily
128.7kph, swinging away after pitching on back of length outside off, Dhawan punches it to cover point
swing again. Pitched it on middle and leg, it was swinging away from Dhawan and he left it dangerously
swinging away again, it was a touch fuller and Dhawan pushed it back to the bowler
edged and it reaches Sanga after a bounce! It was shaping away from Dhawan, he cut the ball off the back foot and a bottom edge bounced before reaching the keeper
length delivery swinging away from Dhawan from outside off, left alone
fuller and wider, Dhawan leans forward and leaves
angled in a bit from back of length towards Rahane, he stays back and defends on the off side
bit wider outside off and on short of length, he defends it back
touch wider, Rahane leans forward and opens the face of the bat towards the off side and guides it to third man
off the mark in style! It was pitched up on the stumps, Dhawan did not move his feet much and merely got bat on ball at the right time with a straight drive for four past mid-on
back of length on middle and leg, Dhawan waits for it and defends to mid-off with soft hands for a quick single
angling in towards the off stump, Rahane pushes it on the off side
around the off stump and shaping away, Dhawan lets it go
more swing - length delivery just outside off, Dhawan reached out with a forward lean with his bat behind the pad, and misses it
extra bounce and beaten! Dhawan came down the track to attack, Gamage pitched it shorter on leg with the angle and the ball took off to beat Dhawan. Sanga took the ball over his chest
smacked! Short ball with room on offer and Dhawan crunches it off the back foot past point for four! Will ease some nerves for Dhawan after that maiden over he faced
slightly wide outside off, Dhawan came down again but left it this time
angled across from length outside off, Dhawan leans forward and leaves with his bat behind pad again
back of length and outside off, Rahane defends towards cover
shorter and wider, Rahane chases to cut without much footwork but doesn't middle it
angled in a bit towards off and middle, Rahane takes a step across and pushes it to mid-on
fuller delivery just outside off, driven down softly to mid-off this time
around off again, but it's full and Rahane whips it off the front foot, using the angle to fine leg for one
nearly a yorker on middle and leg, Dhawan digs it out to mid-on

loud appeal for lbw but it struck him outside off! Rahane came forward to push the back of length delivery that was swinging in from outside off and the ball sneaked through the gate. It hit on the thigh pad and was slightly high too
128kph, on length on off and swinging away, Dhawan lets it go
back of length from leg stump, Dhawan goes back and tucks it to midwicket
moves across to beat the swing but the ball takes the outside edge after pitching on length to go down to third man

swinging in form outside off, he uses the angle and flicks it to deep backward square leg for three in the gap before it's cut inside. But Prasad's foot touched the rope while keeping it inside, that's a four
moves across a bit and defends the length delivery down the ground

dropped Sanga flung to his left, reached there too but could not hold on to it. The length delivery swung away from length outside off as Dhawan pushed at it and got an outside edge, Sanga went for it but the ball popped out of his hands even before he landed
towards the stumps now, Dhawan defends towards mid-on with an edge
whipped for four! It was going towards his pads from outside leg, was pitched up and Dhawan used his wrists to loft on the leg side for a powerful four
beaten again! Length delivery outside off and swinging away, the forward defence is beaten
on length on middle and leg, now, he defends it back to the bowler
moves out of the crease while Prasad is in the run up, pushes the length delivery back to him
swings it in sharply towards the pads, Rahane's bat doesn't come down on time to flick and they take a leg bye
charges down, swings it outside off and is beaten as the bowler pitches it well outside off
outside the leg side this time, leg bye for Dhawan as well
Rahane swings it this time expecting the inswing, it doesn't swing and he's also beaten! He marched down, went for the big swing and could not connect
short ball swinging in, tucked off the back foot to fine leg in the gap for two
132kph, swinging in form outside off, Rahane pushes it down to mid-off
length delivery on the off stump, Dhawan defends on the back foot
angling away from outside off, Dhawan reaches out for the ball and drives it firmly, but straight to cover
finds the gap this time, driven through the covers for four! It was fuller and still outside off, he reached out for it again and timed it perfectly through the covers
full and on length around off, driven a bit wide of mid-off for a quick single
just short of shot fine leg! It was angled in, Rahane worked it off the pads down on leg and it didn't carry as he looked to clear the fielder
angled in again towards the batsman, clipped wide of shot fine leg for one
full and wide, he charges down and smacks it through the covers for a beautiful cover drive for four right in the gap
short ball outside off, Rahane takes a step down and manages an edge close to himself for one
fullish on the pads, Dhawan plomps his front foot forward and defends
full again and it's straighter, Dhawan cashes in this time and drives it straight down the ground past the umpire for four. Not a very firm drive, a push-cum-drive
beats him this time! Short of length on middle and leg with a bit of swing, Dhawan stays back to defend and it beaten by the bounce too
takes it on the pad as it's from outside leg, Dhawan wanted to flick but missed
swing for him too, misses the inside edge! Length delivery with the wobbly seam outside off, Rahane reached out and missed it
stays in, doesn't move his feet and pushes the length ball uppishly past cover point for one
angled across from off stump, pushed towards cover for one
122kph, angled in towards the stumps, Rahane defends it back
short ball is pulled and a top edge gets him four! Rahane charged down, Mathews pitched it short, Rahane replied with a pull and the edge flew well over the keeper's head for four
length delivery outside off, pushed past cover for one and that brings up the 50 for India
slightly full outside off, Rahane pushes it down to mid-on
shorter outside off, there's room and Rahane stays back, waits for it and cuts it with beautiful timing past point in the gap for four as the ball races away for four
closer to the batsman outside off, he pushes it to cover and wants one but Dhawan says now
touch shorter and wider, pushed off the back foot to deep cover for one
back of length on leg with the angle, Dhawan defends it late on the off side
on length on the pads, tucks it softly towards midwicket for one
angles it across from the of stump, Dhawan lets it go
fuller and slower on off, pushed past silly mid-off for one
angled in towards the batsman who defends on the leg side with a thick inside edge
on length on middle and leg, defends it to midwicket
fullish on the off stump, pushed down the ground to mid-on
length delivery outside off, Rahane defends off the back foot to point. Just one from the over
back of length towards off stump from middle and leg, he defends off the back foot on the off side
on length on middle and off, Dhawan leans forward to defend and takes a quick single
length delivery coming in towards off stump, pushed wide of mid-off and a fumble there allows them to come back for the second
swings and misses! It was shaping away this time, Rahane chased the delivery as it went away and could not connect
fuller outside off, whipped down to mid-on for one
bit of outswing for the short of length delivery on middle, Dhawan defends it late towards point
there's a man in the deep but he pulls it away for six! Short ball coming in towards Rahane, he rocks back and pulls it to clear the deep midwicket fielder easily for six
short ball again, this time wider outside off and he lets it go
length delivery outside off, pushed down to mid-off
short of length and coming in, Rahane looks to clip it on the leg side but gets a leg bye
swings it into Dhawan after pitching it on short of length, Dhawan wants to help it to the leg side but misses
angled across outside the off stump, helps it down to third man for one and that's drinks
length delivery on the off stump, defends towards cover for a quick one but Rahane sends him back
back of length and angling across, gets a bottom edge off the cut
touch shorter and wider, Dhawan cuts it late with a swish past point to third man for one
seaming in from outside off, Rahane leans forward and defends
beaten! Back of length outside off, Rahane jabs at it without using his feet and misses
fuller towards the pads and it's clipped to deep midwicket for one
turning in from middle stump, helped with the turn to the leg side for one
bit of flight on the off stump on length, Dhawan defends on the back foot
charges down and turns it to long-on by taking it on the full
turn from outside off, Rahane goes back and cuts it to deep point after the turn
length delivery outside off, Dhawan chops it to point off the back foot
flighted on middle and off, pushed down to mid-on after coming down the track
back of length outside leg, worked off the back foot to deep midwicket

dropeed again! Rahane this time, and it goes for four! Sangakkara is the man again - the ball was coming in a bit form outside off, Rahane presented the face of the bat and the ball was going between Sanga and the wide first slip. Sanga had to go for it, he did and just got a glove to it despite diving full length to his right. This one was much tougher than the first chance
angled in a bit towards the batsman, he defends it
fuller outside off, driven firmly to cover
touch shorter on length outside off, he defends it to cover
shaping away this time from back of length, Rahane pokes and misses
comes down a step and turns the ball to midwicket against the spin
fuller outside off, Dhawan defends it on the off side
bit of flight on the leg stump, Dhawan sweeps it fine down the leg side for two
comes down again and defends the length delivery back to the bowler
charges down, drives the ball down to long-off for one
turning towards leg from middle and leg, helped to backward square leg for one
short of length outside off, turned off the back foot towards deep midwicket in the gap for two. Clever shot
on length and wide outside off, Rahane swings and gets an inside edge to fine leg
on length on middle stump, heaves it to deep square leg in the air for one
wide given for the height - it was a bouncer outside off and he let it go
bit of seam movement to bring it in from outside off, Rahane defends towards point
back of length towards the off stump, defends it softly on the leg side for one
outside the off stump, pushes it to cover
chips it in the air to just clear mid-off by coming down the track and taking the ball on the full. Gets two runs
goes back this time and helps it with the turn to backward square leg for one and that's his second consecutive fifty
bit of flight on middle stump, Dhawan knows where the gap is and paddle sweeps it fine down the leg side for four
swept on the other side now for four! It was fullish outside off and he reverse swept it fine to beat short third man
he wants more - he smacks a six! Charges down the track and tonks the ball against the turn to the long-on boundary for six to bring up his fifty
tries to sweep the ball from middle stump, can't connect
he chases the delivery outside off and misses again
angled in this time from back of length towards middle stump, tucked on the leg side for one
on length on middle and off, Dhawan heaves with the cross bat on the leg side, doesn't middle but gets enough on it to find another four
clever shot - four more! It was short outside off, there's no slip and Dhawan waits for the ball, and just opens the face of the bat late to guide it for four by beating third man
straighter delivery and he pushes it down the ground
charges down to smash it, Perera pitches it short and he gets a single to mid-off despite not middling it
pretty flat on off stump and short of length, Dhawan goes back and pushes it down to long-on
length delivery on off, turned off the back foot to long-on
on middle and leg, Dhawan reverse sweeps it against the turn fine on the off side for three in the gap
fuller outside off, Rahane pushes it to cover with the turn
flatter on middle and leg, Rahane comes down and clips to midwicket
outside off on length, Rahane cuts it late past point and in the gap for two
low full toss on off stump, pushed down to mid-off for one
full and outside off, Rahane smacks it with a cover drive but straight to cover
short of length outside off, guides it late to third man for one
he heaves on the leg side again, doesn't middle it, it goes in the air but in the gap between midwicket and mid-on for another four
charges down, Prasad pitches it short and Dhawan was looking to pull but turned it to midwicket
makes room to pull the back of length delivery on leg sutmp but defends it back
Rahane charged down and Gamage sends down a beamer on the off side. No ball for that and Gamage apologises saying it slipped out of his hands
looks to work the length delivery on the leg side but gets it on the pad
full and angling in, Rahane lofts it with the angle to the wide long-on boundary for four. He saw the fielding change and didn't hit it too hard, only in the gap for four
on the other side now, it was fullish outside off and Rahane drives it up in the air to just clear mid-off for four
fullish on middle and leg, flicked softly to mid-on for a quick one
short ball angled in, Dhawan stays back and pulls it late to beat short fine leg for another four - third of the over
fuller delivery angled in, heaves on the leg side and gets a thick edge to deep backward square leg
full just outside off, reverse-swept straight to short third man
on length on the middle stump, he pushes it to cover by coming down
takes a step down again, pushed down to long-off this time for one
he makes a lot of room and cuts off the back foot to find the gap between cover and cover point very well for four
turning in from outside off, pushed down to long-on for one
big six, 11 from the over, no respite for any bowler! It was well outside off, Dhawan came down the track and smoked it to the long-on boundary for six with mid on in the circle
short of length outside off, turned off the back foot on the leg side for one
short ball on middle and leg, Dhawan makes room to pull but can't middle yet another delivery, settles for one
smashed down the ground for four! He came down the track for the back of length delivery, slapped it back past the bowler in the air for four to beat mid-off too
another four! Short ball angled in, he stayed back and pulled it with some power to beat fine leg and collects another four
bouncer angled in towards the batsman, he lets it go
moves across towards off, turns the length delivery from outside off to long on for one
bowling change doesn't help! It was short of length outside off, he came down the track and smashes it over and wide of mid-off for four to welcome Mathews back
slow offcutter well outside off, pushed to short third man for one
what have these two eaten today?! Short of length outside leg, Dhawan stayed there and slapped it to the midwicket boundary in the gap
outside the off stump now, defends softly for one towards cover
slow bouncer outside the off stump, Rahane looks for the upper cut and misses and it's a wide for height
pulled over long-on for six! These two are unleashing some unusual shots! He came down for the short delivery and slap-pulled it over long for maximum. Mid on was in the circle
fuller towards middle and leg, flicked to deep midwicket for one
flattish delivery outside off, swiped down the ground to long-on
fullish outside leg, reverse swept to the off side for one
on length on off and turning away, turned down to long-on for one
full toss on middle stump, pulled to deep midwicket
down the leg side past the pads, not given a wide
fullish well outside off, driven straight to cover
slightly slow on length outside off, pushed to point for one
flattish outside off with room, Rahane middles it with a swish in the gap between cover and mid-off
loud loud appeal from Dilshan, turned down and he's not happy! It was turning into the batsman, struck him in front of leg stump and was surely going down leg
on length on off stump, he defends it back
wider outside off on length, tucked to midwicket
closer to middle stump with the turn and he defends it. That's the second drinks
pitched up outside off, pushed down the ground for one
flattish on off stump, pushed back to the bowler
on the elg stump and going down, clipped of the pads to backward square leg
comes down and helps the ball with the turn to midwicket
takes a step down and pushes the ball down to long-off
full delivery outside off, defends it back to the bowler
slow in the air, Dhawan comes down and drives the full ball down to long-off
on length outside off, Rahane goes back and pushes it past midwicket for one
shuffles across a bit and defends the length ball to the leg side
full toss on middle and leg, pushed down to long-on for one
full on middle stump, pushed down gently to long-on and that's his second ODI hundred
low full toss outside leg, swept to fine leg for one
length delivery on the leg stump, worked off the back foot to fine leg
comes down and whips it down to long on
he reaches the 100 with a six and celebrates his trademark style - helmet off, both arms wide in the air. Charged down the track and tonked it over midwicket for a flat six
fullish on the stumps and he leans forward to defend
outside off this time and he goes on the back foot to cut it fiercely in the gap to sweeper cover for four
comes down and drives it down to long on for one
low full toss on middle, reverse swept to short third man
comes down the track and lofts the ball on the full just wide of long-on for one more four. The crowd is loving in
wide outside off and it's cut off the back foot to deep point for two in the gap
comes down and pushes the ball to long-on for one
fullish on middle stump, Dhawan defends
outside off this time and Dhawan guides it late towards short third man for one
fullish on middle and leg, tucked to deep midwicket
flighted well outside off, Rahane comes down and drives it to deep cover
nearly yorks himself by coming down, defends back to the bowler
finds the gap again, comes down the track to take it on the full and whips it against the turn for four to midwicket
thinks of the reverse sweep but defends it back

finally a wicket and how! Sri Lanka will take it however it comes now. Dhawan went down on a knee to sweep the flighted delivery on leg stump, pivoting on the back foot, got an inside edge onto his front leg and the ball rolled down to just clip leg stump and the leg bail falls softly
turning in from off and middle, tucked off the back foot to square leg for one
dowa the leg side past the batsman and keeper, it goes through Sanga's gloves but not too far
on length on middle, pushed off the back foot after making room to sweeper cover and he's off the mark
goes back and pushes the ball in the air past Raina for one to long-on
back of length on leg, goes down on a knee and slap-pulls it to short fine leg
length delivery on off stump, driven softly to cover for a quick single
comes down and drives the full ball back to the bowler

appeal for run-out at the non-striker's end. Rahane looks safe though. Raina droive the low full toss back to the bowler, Priyanjan got a hand to it and it hit the stumps. Rahane's bat was back in the crease jsut in time
slides the ball towards middle, Raina pushes off the back foot to cover
he plays that shot very well! Came down the track and played the inside out drive very well in the gap through the covers for four
well outside off and he guides it late to short third man for one
turning in from well outside off, pushed against the turn to mid-off
how about that shot? Raina charges down and hits a lofted straight drive down the ground by taking it on the full for a big six
slower and on middle stump, defends to cover after making room
fuller outside off, swept against the turn to midwicket
on the off stump, keeps very low and it's pushed off the back foot down to long-on
another century comes to an end, this one off a full toss! Rahane came down the track to loft the low full toss over mid off but didn't time it well and gave a simple catch to Jayawardene
turning into the batsman, worked to midwicket off the back foot
angling away from outside off, pushed on the off side
towards the leg side this time and it's clipped off the pads to deep square leg and they run very well for two
back of length on the middle stump, Raina defends it back
angled across from middle stump, guides it with the open face of the bat to third man
shaping away from outside off, driven to sweeper cover for one
fullish outside off, Raina drives to cover but inside edge goes back to the bowler
well outside the off stump, Kohli stays back and waits for it before cutting it to deep point for two
goes back and across to help it to square leg with the turn
well outside off, goes back to push it to midwicket this time
low and flighted full toss on middle and leg, flicked to deep midwicket for one
goes on the back foot to defends the delivery outside off
flighted and low full toss around off, pushed gently on the off side
full on the pads and Rains flicks it in the air high to the midwicket boundary for four
towards off stump now, driven down the ground to long-off for one
length delivery outside off, Kohli drives it beautifully through the covers upposhly for four. It wasn't too full but he timed it very well just past short cover

chance for a run out, Raina gets a lifeline! Kohli went on the back foot to turn the ball between the bowler and midwicket, and took off for the single. But Raina didn't want it and stays in the crease, Kohli comes down all the way. But Perera dives to stop it and rolls over and by the time midwicket picks it up and throws, Raina goes to the keeper's end
times it beautifully over the covers for four! It was full and slightly wide and he collects the third four of the over
and how does he end the over, that's six! Short ball down the leg side and he pulls it for a massive six over the fine leg boundary for maximum
full delivery down the leg side for a wide as Kohli tries to sweep and they run one too
comes down to make it a low full toss and drives to long-off
drifting in towards the pads and it's full, pushes it down easily to long-on
takes a step down, Randiv pitches it shorter on the stumps and Raina defends it on the off side
turning into the batsman from outside off, worked to deep midwicket by closing the face of the bat
flighted, full and wide and Raina slices it late after waiting for it and swishes it past point for four
length delivery outside off, he pushes it off the back foot on off for one
angled towards the pads and it's clipped to fine leg for one
in the block hole outside off, blocks it to cover for one
angled towards the pads from length and it's worked to deep square leg for two in the gap
fullish just outside off, pushes to sweeper cover for one
low and wide full toss, driven straight to cover. Kohli will be unhappy for not putting that away
short of length out of off this time, swishes and finds point now
comes down take make it a full toss and drives it wide of long-off for one
reaches his fifty the way Dhawan reached his hundred! Came down, got the length delivery on the full and tonked it over the midwicket boundary for six

oh he's gone on the very next ball, given lbw! Went too far across for the sweep, the ball pitched on middle and leg and had a bit of angle, Raina missed and was struck in front of leg stump and the umpire took his time to raise the finger
pushes the incoming delivery from outside off to cover
flight but hardly any turn from outside off, Rayudu gets a bottom edge on the off side
helped with the turn to long-on for one
short ball outside off, Kohli rocks back and pulls it to the midwicket boundary for four in the gap
flat on middle stump, slap-pulled between deep midwicket and long on for two in the gap
flat delivery outside off on length, cuts it to point
charges down and swishes the length delivery to sweeper cover for one
bit of flight on the off stump, Rayudu pushes it back
nearly in the block hole on off stump, drives it down to long-off
pushes the turning delivery down to long-on for one
flighted full toss on leg stump, flicked to midwicket
comes down for a big drive but gets a thick inside edge past the stumps and the keeper for one
turning in from middle stump as Rayudu makes room but doesn't get any and defends on the leg side for one
nearly yorks himself by coming down and pushes it to long-on

Kohli holes out and gives Randiv his third wicket on the last ball of his spell! It was a poor delivery, very short and on the leg side, Kohli pulled and only found the fielder in the deep at backward square leg
beautifully executed inside out shot with the turn over the covers for a four. Came down the track and took it on the full
still wide outside off and he finds the gap again. Made room, waited for the ball and drove it over the covers between long-off and sweeper cover for four
drives the length delivery down to long-off this time
length delivery turning away from outside off, cut off the back foot to deep point
fullish on the leg stump, pushed down to long-on for one
length delivery outside off, chopped with the turn to deep point for one
full on middle and leg, flicked to deep midwicket for one
excellent timing! It was wide outside off and short of length, he chopped the ball late to pierce the gap between short third man and point for four
140kph, first bouncer of the over goes over Rayudu as he tried to hook
another short ball as he charges down to pull and misses again
makes room for the delivery outside off and swishes it with power to sweeper cover where Priyanjan slides to his right and saves two

that's gone high in the air but falls in between three fielders! Rayudu stayed back to heave the full delivery from outside off to the leg side, got a leading edge which went high behind square on the off side and fell between deep point, point and third man
wide down the leg side past the batsman, Sanga fumbles and they run one too
smashes the full delivery back to the bowler and he drops it. Goes down to long-on for one
another beamer from Gamage - high full toss near the off stump line and it's pulled down the ground. But he's not been taken off the attack by the umpire
short delivery coming in, pulled to deep midwicket for two
in the block hole well outside off, sliced straight to point
angled into the batsman, he pulls and gets one to midwicket

one more falls and Gamage gets his first ODI wicket! slower delivery outside the off stump, Rayudu wanted to loft it over the covers but was deceived by the pace. The leading edge went high before it was taken at cover
full just outside off, he goes for a big drive but manages an inside edge on the leg side and even gets for four!
he gets a full toss straightaway and lofts it straight down the ground for a six! Not easy to hit such full tosses own the ground over the bowler's head
full toss again, six again! This one was wide outside off and he drove it over the covers in the gap, the ball lands just outside the rope with a flat trajectory
back of length delivery angling away, swatted down to mid-on for a quick single
in the block hole on off stump, he blocks it back to the bowler
tries the block hole again, gets a low full toss outside off and it's pushed to the covers

that's a skier on the leg side, and put down by Mathews! Akshar swatted the short delivery on the leg side, got a leading edge and Mathews was coming in from midwicket, he got right under it for a simple catch but it popped right out of his hands

inn2.comm: starts with a full delivery outside off, Tharanga drives straight to cover
139kph, swinging into the batsman from off stump on length, he pushes it to the leg side
back of length now outside off, Tharanga chops it on the off side
length delivery shaping in a bit from outside off, pushes it to cover point now
142kph, short and wide, angling away and he lets it go
short and wide again, Tharanga chases and misses. Just went over the top edge and it's a maiden
141kph, outswing for the length ball outside off, Dilshan swings and misses
edged and doesn't carry! Edge came off the drive outside off, Saha dives to his right in front of first slip and gets a hand to it to save a few runs
down the leg side and swinging down further for a wide
fullish on the pads, helped with the swing to fine leg and he's off the mark
bouncer outside off and swinging away, Dilshan swat-pulls it back to the bowler
still can't middle it. It was on length outside off, he drives and gets an edge back to the bowler
bouncer outside the off stump and shaping away, chases to pull and misses
stifled appeal for lbw as it swung in from length and hit him in front of leg but was going down and they sneak a leg bye
down the leg side for a wide now, left-right combination messing with the lines
short of length around the off stump holding its line, Dilshan tucks it to leg for one
back of length and coming in towards the batsman, hes crammed for room but works it to fine leg for one
full on the pads and it's flicked wide of mid-on in the gap for four. First boundary for SL, Dilshan finally middles it well
beaten! Length delivery swinging away from outside off, Dilhan didn't move his feet and chased with a drive and missed it
beaten again - second time in a row. Similar length outside off and he was beaten by the swing again
also beaten! Angled across the batsman from outside off, Tharanga drives and misses
145kph, down the leg side for another wide
the bounce gets a thick edge but it's very wide and short of second slip! Tharanga stayed back for the back of length delivery, it got his glove actually before going wide of Raina for one
145.6kph, angled in towards the batsman and it's clipped to deep backward square leg for two
147kph, inswing this time from back of length, Dilshan's bat comes down a bit late and he chops it to third man
another wide down the leg side, Aaron's third
short ball banged in outside off, Tharanga looked for the upper cut but seemed to have withdrawn his bat, the ball still went off the bat to third man
on length on the off side, pushed down to mid-off
outside the off stump on back of length, can't clear point
fuller outside the off stump, Tharanga slices it to third man after a bounce
beaten again outside off! Outswing from Umesh just outside off on length and Dilshan has been beaten more than thrice like this now. Not much footwork from him
slightly closer to off stump and it's pushed to cover for one
short ball towards the leg stump, goes down leg off the bat and he gets two as Saha gets a hand to it
short of length outside off now, swat-pulled down to mid-on
that's gone through Raina! Dilshan drove the ball outside off, got a thick edge towards gully where Raina allowed it to go through his legs after a bounce
146kph, pushes the length delivery down to mid-off
swings it in from back of length, Tharanga stays in the crease to defend off the back foot and poked his bat a little to miss the outside edge
back of length and angled in, pushed to point off the back foot
bangs in the short ball at 148kph towards the batsman from outside off, he defends it softly towards midwicket for one
finds the gap between first slip and gully! It was quick and short not very wide outside off, Dilshan stayed back and executed a late cut pretty late for four
143kph, bangs in the short ball towards the batsman, Tharanga pulled, was beaten by pace and gets his near the shoulder
angled in again towards the pads, defends it on leg
143.7kph, inswing from outside off, Tharanga has no time to play and gets hit on the back pad pretty high
fuller and wider outside off, he chases without much footwork and finds point
what bounce! It was maybe a tad short of length outside off, Tharanga poked and missed and Saha caught the ball over his head!
144kph, length delivery outside off is pushed towards cover and that's a maiden
135kph, angled into the batsman and it's tucked to fine leg for one
135.8kph, angled across and beaten! Tharanga poked his bat out just outside off and missed it
fuller this time and misses again! It was pitched up and was wider outside off, Tharanga chased without much footwork and could not connect again
back of length from outside leg towards middle stump, defends off the back foot on off
beaten yet again! Back of length delivery angled across from leg stump, Tharanga wanted to defend off the back foot and missed it by a whisker
towards middle stump now from outside leg, tucked to midwicket now
length delivery outside off is pushed to cover point
141kph, swing and another miss! On length and swinging away, Dilshan drives and misses
fuller outside off, whipped with the wrists to mid-on
back of length and pretty wide outside off, cuts it late to clear point and Ishant cuts it inside by running to his right

finally there's an outside edge after numerous misses! Back of length outside off and swinging away, good bounce this time, Dilshan goes for the square cut and gives an outside edge to Saha. Umesh breaks the opening stand
short ball outside off and angled in, he swats it to the leg side for two
edged for four! It was fullish outside off, Tharanga drove and got a thick outside edge to beat the three slips and third man for four
135.8kph, beaten again! Length delivery lands on the seam around off, Tharanga pushes at it tentatively and misses it completely
fuller outside off and it's pushed to cover point where a misfield gives them a single
back of length towards the off stump, he defends off the back foot
towards middle stump from outside leg, defends off the back foot towards midwicket
bouncer on the leg stump is left by Tharanga as he ducks under it
132 kph, full and wide from round the wicket, exquisite cover drive in the air by going down on a knee from Sanga over the infield for four
139kph, angled in from length towards the off stump and Sanga defends this time
141kph, back of length outside off, defends with soft hands towards covers for a quick single
over second slip! Fullish and wide, Tharanga chased with a drive without any footwork and the extra bounce makes the leading edge fly over second slip for four
length delivery outside off, drive it square to point this time
146.5, gets the extra pace but bangs in the short ball down leg for a wide
short and wide, he cuts it square but not with much power to point
back of length on the off stump and angling away, Sanga lets it go
Sanga beaten this time! This one came in a bit from back of length out side off, Sanga pushed but could not connect
what a shot from Sanga! Stunning...he came down and made room, the ball was angling across from length and he absolutely smashed it over cover point for a four

there's a run out chance! Back of length on leg stump, tucked off the back foot to deep midwicket and looked like Sanga wanted two. Tharanga turned around for the second but there was no time for it and he's coming back to the keeper's end. The direct hit has made it very very close, but it looks like he has just made it. Not out says third umpire
short of length outside leg, Tharanga ducks thinking it's bouncer but it doesn't bounce as much as he took his eyes off the ball and got hit around the shoulder
slightly back of length towards middle stump, defends it back off the back foot
142kph, length delivery outside off and it beats Tharanga as he chases it without any footwork
keeps a bit low as it comes in towards middle stump, he defends it back
length delivery angled in again, he defends again
excellent placement! It was short and wide, Tharanga cut it late to bisect the gap between point and short third man for four
closer to the stumps now and he defends it back
well outside off on length, driven to sweeper cover for two
back of length delivery angled outside off, Sanga defends off the back foot

he's got the big wicket, Ishant has removed Sanga! It was angled across the batsman, he had been persisting with this line for very long and Sanga edged it to Saha off the back foot as the ball seamed away from him. The umpires are checking for a no ball but it's safe
137.9kph, back of length and coming in, MJ defends on the leg side
angled down the leg side past the batsman for a wide
back of length and well outside off, guides it to third man for one
back of length outside the leg stump, tucked to fine leg for one
length delivery outside off holds its line a bit as MJ lets it go
keeps low after pitching outside off on length going under the bat
flighted and full on the off stump, pushed down to long-off for one
turning in from well outside off, and he chops it late towards point
fuller outside off, pushed with the turn to sweeper cover for one
that's a clean six! Such confidence from MJ - charged down the track and launched a straight six over long-on. Such elegance from the batsman
flighted well outside off, reaches out an turns it to midwicket
back of length from outside leg, tucked off the back foot towards mid-on for one
angled towards middle and leg, clipped down to fine leg for one
angled across outside the off stump, pushed to sweeper cover for one
bouncer angled in and he ducks under it
what a back-foot punch! It was back of length outside off, MJ stayed back to go on his toes and punched it late between cover point and point for four right in the gap

short ball and he plays it late again - four more! It was nearly a bouncer and angled in, MJ waited for the last moment and opened the face of the bat for the ramp shot over first slip to beat third man
flighted on middle stump, pushed down to the bowler
straight to long-on for a simple catch! It was pitched up on middle and leg and Tharanga chipped it down the ground against the turn for a high and easy catch to Dhawan. SL three down now
loud appeal for a catch turned down! MJ looked to sweep the ball from outside off and the ball lobbed up high near short leg where Saha took the catch. But no bat there
fullish outside off and it's pushed down to long-on for one
defends the turning ball from off on the leg side
straighter delivery on the off stump and he blocks it back. Good return from Ashwin with a wicket and only one from this over
the late cut comes out again and he gets another four! It was turning away from outside off, he rocked back and cut it very late past slip and short third man for four
one more! This one was closer to off stump from length, he made room on the back foot and opened the face of the bat very late to cut it past slip again
angled in this time towards middle and leg, tucked to midwicket for one
slightly shorter outside off, defends it towards cover
touch slower through the air, he leans forward to defend and is beaten
touch wider outside off, he wants to defend but withdrew his bat as it turned away
bit of flight on off stump, he moves across and clips it to deep midwicket
length delivery on the off stump, tucked to midwicket tentatively
touch fuller on off stump, pushed down to long on and he's off the mark
what a shot! Looked absolutely effortless! It was turning in from outside off, MJ merely chipped it in the air wide of long-on with the turn for four in the gap
shorter this time and he clips it off the back foot to the leg side
straight delivery on off to end the over, pushed down to long on for one
down the leg side past the pads for a wide
angled in towards middle stump, tucked to fine leg for one
141.7kph, keeps a bit low on off stump coming in from outside, he clips it to deep midwicket off the back foot
straight delivery outside off, pushed to point without any footwork
short ball down leg and it's pulled to deep fine leg in the air for one
back of length towards off stump, he defends it back
short ball angled in, it's pulled to fine leg for one more
length delivery outside off, MJ leans forward and defends it back
pushed to midwicket off the front foot with the turn
tries to sweep the ball from outside of but misses and takes it on the pad
well outside off, plays the late cut but straight to short third man
flatter on middle stump, goes back and helps it to fine leg
turning in sharply after flight outside off, lobs off bat and pad on the leg side

one more falls, the SL batsmen are giving wickets on a flat pitch! Slightly short of length outside off, Prasanna went back to cut it and sliced it straight to Rahane at backward point. First wicket for Patel
slides it in towards middle and leg, tucked off the back foot to deep midwicket for two
tries to cut off the back foot outside off, misses it
goes in the crease and pushes it to mid-on
leans forward and defends the ball outside off
leans forward again, gets a thick inside edge towards midwicket for one
keeps a bit low from outside off, defends off the front foot
extra bounce this time as he stays back to tuck it down leg to fine leg with the turn
short of length outside off, turned off the back foot to leg side
just wide of leg slip! It turned a long way from outside off, inside edge flew to the leg side and went past the fielder
goes back and helps it with the turn to the leg side
presses forward for the length delivery outside off and pushes it to point
angled in towards middle stump, turned to midwicket
pushes the fullish delivery on off and Akshar chases and dives to stop it
towards middle stump now, leans forward and blocks
puts his front foot forward and sweeps it past short fine leg for four! It was shorter than the other delivery and he swept it against the turn in the gap
flatter outside off and he swishes it straight to point
straighter on the middle stump, blocks it back
full outside off, chipped down the ground to long-on for one
full on middle this time, flicked to deep midwicket with the turn
length delivery outside off, defends it back to the bowler
that's a powerful reverse sweep! He switched early and packed a lot of strength into that shot towards sweeper cover for four
short and wide this time and he punches that off the back foot for another four - sweeper cover region again
turning in from outside off, he pushes it towards cover
another soft dismissal - Patel gets MJ! It was a length delivery outside off, MJ drove it straight to Kohli short cover and he's very disappointed with that shot. Does that seal the chase for India?
flighted on the off stump, he blocks it back
flighted and angled in towards off stump again, blocks it on the front foot
comes down a bit and blocks the delivery outside off stump
sharp turn and bounce from outside off, he went back to cut it and left it eventually
tucked against the turn to the leg side for one now
flighted and low full toss on off, clipped to midwicket
driven with the turn to long-on from length on middle stump
shorter delivery well outside off, punched off the back foot to long-off
comes down the track and drives the full toss to long-on
length delivery on off stump, pushed to midwicket
straighter on the stumps and he defends it back
flighted outside off, pushed to the off side
drives it against the turn to long-on for one
flighted on the stumps and he defends it back
bit of flight into the batsman, he leans forward and defends
he goes back to pull it powerfully, mis-hits to midwicket
slices it off the back foot to deep point for one
turning in a bit from outside off, he defends it back
nearly yorks himself after coming down, drives it down to long-on for one
flighted on off stump, driven down to long-on for one more
full on the off stump, flicked straight to midwicket
full on the off stump, drives it down to long-on
full delivery on the stumps, he comes down and pushes it back to the bowler
flighted in towards off stump, he leans forward and blocks
touch shorter towards middle stump and he blocks it back
missed it completely! Mathews cut the ball late, got a thick outside edge and it went straight to slip but Raina was going to his right, no idea why. The ball went through his left side
bit of flight outside off and he defends it there
pushes the length delivery towards cover from outside off
slides it in from outside off, chops off the back foot to deep point

another catch taken, and Mathews also falls! He went for a big heave for the ball that was turning in, didn't quite middle it and it went straight to Akshar at midwicket. Raina dropped one off Akshar in the last over and now Akshar takes one off Raina
flighted on the off stump, pushed down the ground for one
comes down the track to defend and is beaten by the turn to take it on the pad
pitches it outside leg and that spins down further for four more wides
full and wide, driven powerfully straight to cover this time
flighted on off stump, flicked down to long-on with the turn
flighed on the of stump, pushed to cover with the turn
turning in from outside off, he blocks it back
spinning in from outside off, he stays back a clips the ball to leg side
drifting in from outside off on length, he defends it back
driven with the turn down to mid-off from length
short of length on the off stump, turned to deep midwicket for one off the back foot
short of length outside the off stump and he plays an MJesque late cut to the third man area for four
just over mid-off! It was chipped in the air with the turn off the front foot and it went just over Akshar Patel's head
in the air again and the leading edge goes for four! The length delivery was reverse swept to the third man for four even though it went high in the air for quite long
turned against the spin to long-on for one
clipped off the pads to square leg with the turn
pushes the length delivery down the ground past Raina for one
goes on the back foot and whips it off the back foot to long-on for one
back of length on the leg stump, clipped off the pad to mid-on for one

excellent delivery with extra bounce and it held its line for the outside edge! Ishant pitched it outside off on back of length, Priyanjan poked outside off and a thin outside edge landed safely in Saha's hands
just misses the outside edge as Randiv jabs at it outside off and doesn't connect
short of length angled in from outside off, Randiv defends it on the off side
makes him reach out for the ball well outside off, he drove tentatively and missed
bouncer angled down the leg side and that's a no ball for overstepping. Massive no ball
bouncer down the leg side for a wide and that's an excellent take from Saha with his right hand way down the leg side
full toss outside off and it's driven all along the ground through the covers for a four in the gap
flat and short of length on off, he pushes it back
short of length on off again, pushed down to mid-off
flighted and full on the off stump, turned to midwicket now
flighted outside off, he defends towards cover
short of length outside off, cuts off the back foot to sweeper cover for one
length delivery turning down leg from off, clipped to backward square leg for one
defends the length delivery outside off towards cover
edges it onto the stumps! It was a back of length delivery outside off, Randiv pushed at it as the ball seamed in which took the inside edge before rattling the stumps
bangs in the short ball outside off, he defends it off the back foot
what bounce and that even held its line, beating the batsman outside off as he pushed at it
swing and a miss again! It was fuller outside off, he went for the drive and missed it completely
excellent bounce once again and he takes another wicket! He banged in a short ball from outside off, it was angling in as Prasad pushed off the back foot and edged it to Saha
comes down for the big shot and manages a thick inside edge down the leg side for four by beating short fine leg
swats the fuller delivery down to mid-on
keeps very low after pitching on off and it turns away as Perera went back to cut and missed it
99.4kph, quicker and flatter delivery, Perera tries to reverse sweep it but misses
short of length outside off, he slices it off the back foot to deep point where Rahane runs and dives to save two runs

loud appeal for lbw turned down! It was a slider angling in from outside off, Perera looked to turn it to leg but was struck on the front pad. It looked very very close and maybe he was struck marginally outside off
short of length outside the leg stump, tucked off the hips to fine leg
length delivery angled in, Gamage blocks it back
teasing line and length outside off, making him drive and goes past the outside edge
slightly slower on length outside off, he pokes and misses again
back of length delivery well outside off with good bounce, it's left alone
full delivery well outside off, swishes it straight to point
length delivery on the middle stump, cuts it off the back foot on the off side
that's turning down the leg side even though there's an appeal for the carrom ball and they sneak in a leg bye
bit of flight on off stump, Perera goes down on a knee and sweeps it to backward square leg boundary for four
goes high in the air and falls short of long-on! It was the arm ball at 99.8kph, flat and quick, Perera pulled and it didn't reach Dhawan
leans forward to block the length delivery outside off
stays back this time to defend it outside off
tries the yorker, it's a full delivery on the stumps and it's crunched down the ground to beat everyone for four

is that taken at long-on, Ishant is claiming it! Umesh followed the attempted yorker with a short ball, Perera pulled it hard to long-on where Ishant stooped low for the catch. It's referred to the third umpire and replays show that he has his fingers under the ball for the catch. Out is the final decision and it's all over
